name: Puzzle Adventures
description:
Puzzle Adventures is a classic choose your own adventure game, which takes place in a small cabin on the beach. In this game the player is tasked to make their own choices and solve puzzles to unlock hidden messages, the game features many genre's including:
*Platformer
*Puzzle
*Choose Your Own Adventure
*Text Based

Main gameplay features of Puzzle Adventure include: point and click, typing in answers, and making choices to progress the story forward by clicking buttons. The player is mainly tasked to solve puzzles and gain achievements.
